virality_potential.justification: Generic crypto hype with many hashtags but no unique hook; likely to attract niche community but not widespread.

informative_value.justification: Only a promotional statement with no factual content; minimal information.

duration_of_impact.justification: Short-lived hype; relevance fades quickly after the token's buzz subsides.

virality_potential.justification: Official announcement from MetaMask with many followers; new feature likely to be widely shared among crypto users.

informative_value.justification: Provides technical details about EIP-4361 and domain binding; credible source.

duration_of_impact.justification: Feature will remain relevant for months as users adopt it.

virality_potential.justification: Question about Ethereum testnet could spark discussion among developers; moderate potential.

informative_value.justification: Asks for input; no new info provided.

duration_of_impact.justification: Discussion may last days to weeks as community responds.

virality_potential.justification: Personal story of early career; relatable and could resonate; moderate virality.

duration_of_impact.justification: Story remains relevant for a while as a motivational anecdote.

virality_potential.justification: Price chart for many cryptocurrencies; widely shared among traders; high virality.

informative_value.justification: Provides visual price data; useful but not deep analysis.

duration_of_impact.justification: Chart relevance lasts until market changes; moderate longevity.
